thread.title: Kylie Minogue confirms split from fiance Joshua Sasse and thanks fans for their ‘love and support’
thread.title_full: Kylie Minogue confirms split from fiance Joshua Sasse and thanks fans for their ‘love and support’

author: lrandell
title: Kylie Minogue confirms split from fiance Joshua Sasse and thanks fans for their ‘love and support’
text:
'We wish only the best for each other' Kylie Minogue confirms split from fiance Joshua Sasse and thanks fans for their ‘love and support’ 
Pop star has opened up about the end of her engagement By Louise Randell, Senior Showbiz Reporter 3rd February 2017, 9:22 am Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments KYLIE Minogue has confirmed her split from fiance Joshua Sasse and insisted the pair “wish nothing but the best for each other”. 
The brave pop star took to social media today to thank fans for their support, and she revealed she is looking forward to moving on with her life. Alamy 5 Kylie Minogue and Joshua Sasse have parted ways 
Kylie confirmed the sad news in a post on Instagram, writing: “Thank you for all your love and support throughout this recent chapter of my life. 
“Thank you now for your love and understanding with the news that Josh and I have decided to go our separate ways. 
“We wish only the best for each other as we venture towards new horizons.” 
She shared the message with a picture of a peaceful-looking sunrise, hinting that the split marks a new beginning for her. Instagram Related stories 'KEEP UP YOU 20 YEAR OLDS!' Peter Andre shows he has still got THOSE famous abs just weeks before he turns 44 KILLER WOMAN Meet Marta Milans, the Spanish actress at the centre of Kylie Minogue's split from fiancé Joshua Sasse GOING APE! Gorilla gives Kate Garraway a fright on Good Morning Britain as it bursts onto set – but all is not as it seems BURN-ING LOINS? Bizarre moment CBB's Kim Woodburn, 74, tells Jedward twins, 25, that she finds them 'quite sexy young men' 'HOW DID I GET SO LUCKY?' Tamara Ecclestone is 'feeling blessed' during another luxury holiday with hubby BODY BEAUTIFUL I'm A Celeb's Nadia Forde looks dramatically different as she shows off incredible body transformation NO MORE EARLY STARTS Dave Berry hanging up his mic as he quits Capital Radio after 10 years on air BUBLE AT BRITS? Find out how Michael Buble's son is doing and if he is still hosting the 2017 Brit Awards 'MY FOREVER BOY' Poppy Delevingne pays tribute to husband James Cook as she spends the evening with David Beckham OH BEY-BY Neighbours' Toadie dresses up as pregnant Beyoncé and jokes he's eating for two in parody snap MAKING EXERCISE SEXY Mariah Carey enjoys a sexy workout wearing fishnet tights, raunchy leotard and stiletto heels BEAR-SOTTED Charlotte Crosby enjoys a night out with new boyfriend Stephen Bear and posts picture with love heart next to it Kylie Minogue will take inspiration from her Neighbours wedding Getty Images 5 The Australian pop veteran is now single again at the age of 48 
It comes after The Sun exclusively revealed that Kylie had ended the engagement and kicked Joshua, 29, out of her London home. 
The Australian singer, 48, is said to be devastated by the break-up as she only recently talked about her plans to walk down the aisle and take his name. 
Furious Kylie ordered toyboy fiancé Joshua out of her home after growing suspicious about his relationship with an actress. 
Kylie believed Joshua had kept secret his increasing closeness to glamorous Spaniard Marta ­Milans , 34, insiders have revealed. Alamy 5 Kylie recently spoke about her wedding plans 
The Can’t Get You Out of My Head singer suspected the British actor of cheating on her and has now removed her “beloved” engagement ring. 
Pals say she is inconsolable at the split — days after she vowed to drop her Minogue surname and become Kylie Sasse when they married. Kylie Minogue kisses her boyfriend in new video Alamy Kylie is now looking forward to moving on with her life 
Our source revealed: “She is absolutely devastated, totally heartbroken. 
“She really believed he was The One. But she no longer trusts him.” 
Joshua is said to have bonded with Marta while filming US TV drama No Tomorrow last year in Vancouver, Canada. Kylie Minogue's glam turn for ALS challenge
